data.title: Yul Brynner (Actor)
data.meta_description: Profile of actor Yul Brynner with biographical facts, historical events and Yul Brynner's married life.
data.text:
Yul Brynner

Full Name: Yuliy Borisovich Briner

Profession: Actor

Biography: The King and I, Anna and the King and The Ten Commandments.

Born: July 11, 1920

Birthplace: Primorsky Krai, Russia

Generation: Greatest Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Monkey

Star Sign: Cancer

Died: October 10, 1985 (aged 65)

Cause of Death: Lung cancer

Historical Events

Rodgers and Hammerstein's musical "The King and I", based on the novel "Anna and the King of Siam", opens at St James Theater, NYC; runs for 1,246 performances, winning 5 Tony Awards; Star Yul Brynner would lead the cast of the 1956 film version, and play the role over 4,200 times

Richard Rodgers and Oscar Hammerstein's musical "The King and I", starring Yul Brynner, closes at the St James Theater, NYC, after 1,246 performances

Biblical drama film "The Ten Commandments", directed by Cecil B. DeMille, starring Charlton Heston and Yul Brynner premieres at the Criterion Theater in NYC

29th Academy Awards: "Around World in 80 Days", Ingrid Bergman, Yul Brynner win

Adaptation of Fyodor Dostoevsky's "The Brothers Karamazov", starring Yul Brynner and featuring William Shatner's film debut, premieres at Radio City Music Hall, NYC

Revival of Rodgers & Hammerstein's musical "The King & I"', with Yul Brynner reprising the role he created in 1951, opens at Uris Theater, NYC; runs for 695 performances

Revival of Rodgers and Hammerstein's musical "The King & I", still starring Yul Brynner opens at Broadway Theater, NYC; runs for 191 performances

Yul Brynner appears in his 4,500th performance of "The King & I"

Anti-smoking ad airs for 1st time on TV, featuring Yul Brynner: he died of smoking-induced lung cancer on 10th October 1985

Personal Life

Actor Yul Brynner (24) weds actress Virginia Gilmore (25) at the Los Angeles County Courthouse; divorce in 1960

Academy Award-winning actor Yul Brynner (39) divorces actress Virginia Gilmore (40) after 15 years of marriage

Actor Yul Brynner (39) weds fashion house executive Doris Kleiner (32) in Mexico City; divorce in 1967

Famous Actors

Charlie Cox

Frank Wedekind

Jack Klugman

James Woods

Mark Wahlberg

Mel Brooks
